Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how Raconli Group ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you browse or interact with our mobile application and catalogue platform. By using our app or communicating with us, you agree to the practices described below.

About the App

Raconli Group is an intuitive and sophisticated mobile application that helps maintain efficient communication with sales advisors, facilitating the sending and consultation of news, events, product catalogues, incentive programs, and other key information quickly and precisely.

Information We Collect

  • Profile Information: Name, email, phone number, or any details you provide when contacting us or chatting with our support team.
  • Browsing & Usage Information: Data about how you interact with the app, such as viewed catalogues, brand preferences, and session duration.
  • Device & Technical Data: Your IP address, device model, operating system, and connection details to improve performance and security.
  • Chat Information: Messages between you and our advisors or admins, stored securely for service quality and support.

How We Use Your Information

  • Provide access to catalogues, news, and incentive programs.
  • Enable communication with sales advisors through chat.
  • Personalize your experience based on your interests and interactions.
  • Ensure app performance, security, and feature improvements.

Cookies & Tracking

We may use cookies or similar technologies to remember your preferences and improve your experience. You can disable cookies from your device or browser settings, but some features may not work properly.

Data Security

We use modern technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure. However, no digital transmission or storage system is 100% secure.

Data Retention

We retain personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined here, such as improving our services, handling support requests, and maintaining communication records.

Children's Privacy

Our app is not designed for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors.

Your Rights

You may contact us at any time to access, correct, or request deletion of your personal information. We will respond in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.
